# HeldItemOption Enumeration

Specifies options related to the item currently being held by an entity.

## Constants
### **AnyItem**
`AnyItem = "AnyItem"`

Any item is being held.
### **NoItem**
`NoItem = "NoItem"`

No item is being held.
